name: Wild Magic (EllenElzai)
description:
Here's all the stuff you need to know about what's going on in this game

The goal of the game is to eliminate all enemies. You have two attacks, both of which are randomly selected. The power meters at the bottom of the screen tell you how much power that attack will have when you activate it.

If a meter is filled, a random effect will be triggered, and the associated power will be switched with another.

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Use First Power

Right Click: Use Second Power

POWERS:

Shield: Using this power makes you invincible

Lightning: You attack a nearby enemy, and if that enemy is close by another enemy, you damage that one too. Links up to three times.

Fire: All enemies within your radius take damage

Balls: Fire projectiles that bounce off surfaces once. Touching these will also kill you

Bomb: All enemies take damage. Using this automatically drains that power's charge

ENEMIES:

Blue: Will always move toward you

Purple: Spins around, firing a single bullet periodically

Yellow: Spins, firing a shotgun-like burst of bullets periodically

Red: Moves toward you. Once in range, will begin glowing, and eventually explode, damaging all within explosion radius.
